events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred at an intersection involving their vehicle and another partyâ€™s car.

An experienced claims agent specializing in auto accidents has been assigned to handle the investigation and follow-up process.
The customer was officially notified that their auto accident claim has been received and is now under review by our team.
The customer was asked to submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and witness statements to support the claim.
All requested documents including damage photos, police report, and insurance details were submitted by the customer without delay.
The claims team has begun the investigation process, assessing all submitted evidence related to the vehicle collision.
The investigation concluded that the customer was not at fault and that the claim meets the coverage terms.
A settlement amount covering all vehicle repairs and related expenses was proposed and communicated to the customer.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and thanked the team for their prompt and fair handling.
Final approval was granted for the settlement payment after confirming all documentation and investigation findings.
The payment covering the repair costs was successfully issued to the customer's bank account as agreed.
The auto accident claim file was formally closed following payment disbursement and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
All claim documents, correspondence, and approvals were archived securely in compliance with company retention policies.
